pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============Reverse Geocode===============Reverse Geocode takes a latitude / longitude coordinate and returns the country and city.Example usage:.. sourcecode:: python >>> import reverse_geocode >>> coordinates = (-37.81, 144.96), (31.76, 35.21) >>> reverse_geocode.search(coordinates) [{'city': 'Melbourne', 'code': 'AU', 'country': 'Australia'}, {'city': 'Jerusalem', 'code': 'IL', 'country': 'Israel'}]..The module has a set of known geocoded locations and uses a `k-d tree <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K-d_tree>`_ to efficiently find the nearest neighbour. This can be useful when you need to reverse geocode a large number of coordinates so a web API is not practical.=======Install=======Supports python 2 & 3:.. sourcecode:: bash pip install reverse-geocode pip3 install reverse-geocode..
